name: Consensus
description: Moderate-majority legislature with low passage thresholds, cooperative executive posture, and strong party discipline. Models a functional government where AI agents can demonstrate legislative effectiveness, coalition building, and responsive governance. Useful as a best-case baseline for benchmarking model quality.
notes: Moderates form an outright majority, making coalition-building natural and cross-aisle votes common. Low quorum and passage thresholds allow legislation to advance quickly. Low veto rates model a cooperative executive. Strong party discipline means agents follow coalition commitments reliably. High bill_throughput and low polarization_index are expected; watch coalition_stability for signs of emergent factionalism even in a cooperative environment.
